name: Twister
description: Only the brave would dare take on the challenge of this ride. Are you ready to face your fears?

name: Mr Monkey's Banana Ride
description: This ride will swing you to the moon and back! Come along for a journey with Mr Monkey as you test your mettle!

name: Dorito
description: This one will have you swallowing back up all the sick you built up.

name: Bullet
description: This one'll send you into the future!

name: Looper
description: Watch in horror as the other carts loop around you!

name: Anti-Gravity
description: Keep your glasses and other accessories safe! This ride won't take kindly to those who like to stay... upright.

name: Impact
description: Prepare your stomach for this dropper.

name: Plummeter
description: Hope you're not afraid of heights. This ride will drop you down so fast your skin will fall off!

name: UFO
description: A nice calm ride that'll allow you to take in the grand scenery here at Robbie's Rodeo!

name: Windmill
description: Just when you think it's over you'll realise it's just getting started hahaha!
